trans-unit.source: Represents the child controls of containers that support <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.TablePattern"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta i controlli figlio di contenitori che supportano <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.TablePattern"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This control pattern is analogous to <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPattern> with the distinction that any control supporting TableItemPattern will programmatically expose the relationship between the individual cell and its row and column information.
trans-unit.target: Questo pattern di controllo è analogo a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPattern>con la differenza che qualsiasi controllo TableItemPattern supporto a livello di programmazione esporrà la relazione tra la singola cella e le relative informazioni di riga e colonna.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPattern>

trans-unit.source: Access to individual cell functionality is provided by the additional support of <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPattern>.
trans-unit.target: Viene fornito accesso alle funzionalità delle singole celle dal supporto aggiuntivo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPattern>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPattern>

trans-unit.source: Gets the cached property values for this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPattern"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene i valori delle proprietà memorizzati nella cache per questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPattern"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Cached property values must have been previously requested using a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.
trans-unit.target: I valori delle proprietà memorizzati nella cache devono essere richiesti in precedenza utilizzando un <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>

trans-unit.source: To get the current value of a property, get the property by using <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPattern.Current%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Per ottenere il valore corrente di una proprietà, ottenere la proprietà utilizzando <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPattern.Current%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPattern.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: For information on the properties available and their use, see <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPattern.TableItemPatternInformation>.
trans-unit.target: Per informazioni sulle proprietà disponibili e il relativo utilizzo, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPattern.TableItemPatternInformation>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPattern.TableItemPatternInformation>

trans-unit.source: The cached property values.
trans-unit.target: I valori delle proprietà memorizzati nella cache.

trans-unit.source: The requested property is not in the cache.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà richiesta non è presente nella cache.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the property that retrieves all the column headers associated with a table item or cell.
trans-unit.target: Identifica la proprietà che recupera tutte le intestazioni di colonna associate a un elemento della tabella o una cella.

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: Questo identificatore viene usato dalle applicazioni client di automazione interfaccia utente.

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: Provider di automazione interfaccia utente devono utilizzare il campo equivalente in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPatternIdentifiers>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPatternIdentifiers>

trans-unit.source: This property is not present in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPattern.TableItemPatternInformation> and must be retrieved by using <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPropertyValue%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCachedPropertyValue%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà non è presente e <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPattern.TableItemPatternInformation>deve essere recuperata utilizzando <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPropertyValue%2A>o <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCachedPropertyValue%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCachedPropertyValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPropertyValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPattern.TableItemPatternInformation>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current property values for this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPattern"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene i valori di proprietà correnti per questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPattern"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This pattern must be from an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> with an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode> reference in order to get current values.
trans-unit.target: Questo modello deve provenire da un <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>con un <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode>riferimento per ottenere i valori correnti.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> was obtained using <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode>, it contains only cached data, and attempting to get the current value of any property raises an exception.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>ottenuto usando <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode>, contiene solo dati memorizzati nella cache e il tentativo di ottenere il valore corrente di qualsiasi proprietà genera un'eccezione.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPattern.Cached%2A> to get the cached value of a property that was previously specified using a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPattern.Cached%2A>per ottenere il valore memorizzato nella cache di una proprietà che è stato precedentemente specificato utilizzando un <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPattern.Cached%2A>

trans-unit.source: For information on the properties available and their use, see <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPattern.TableItemPatternInformation>.
trans-unit.target: Per informazioni sulle proprietà disponibili e il relativo utilizzo, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPattern.TableItemPatternInformation>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPattern.TableItemPatternInformation>

trans-unit.source: The current property values.
trans-unit.target: I valori di proprietà correnti.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPattern"></xref> control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Identifica la <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPattern"> </xref> pattern di controllo.

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: Questo identificatore viene usato dalle applicazioni client di automazione interfaccia utente.

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: Provider di automazione interfaccia utente devono utilizzare il campo equivalente in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPatternIdentifiers>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPatternIdentifiers>

trans-unit.source: The pattern identifier is passed to methods such as <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A> to retrieve the control pattern of interest from the specified <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.
trans-unit.target: Identificatore del pattern viene passata ai metodi, ad esempio <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A>per recuperare il pattern di controllo di interesse da specificata <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the property that retrieves all the row headers associated with a table item or cell.
trans-unit.target: Identifica la proprietà che recupera tutte le intestazioni di riga associate a un elemento della tabella o una cella.

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: Questo identificatore viene usato dalle applicazioni client di automazione interfaccia utente.

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: Provider di automazione interfaccia utente devono utilizzare il campo equivalente in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPatternIdentifiers>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPatternIdentifiers>

trans-unit.source: This property is not present in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPattern.TableItemPatternInformation> and must be retrieved by using <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPropertyValue%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCachedPropertyValue%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà non è presente e <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPattern.TableItemPatternInformation>deve essere recuperata utilizzando <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPropertyValue%2A>o <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCachedPropertyValue%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCachedPropertyValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPropertyValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPattern.TableItemPatternInformation>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.
